verses.verse: <S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> a <S%G4639>shadow<s%> of the <S%G18>good<s%> to <S%G3195>come,<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G846>very<s%> <S%G1504>image<s%> of the <S%G4229>things,<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G3763>never<s%> with the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G2378>sacrifices<s%> year <S%G2596>by<s%> <S%G1763>year,<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> they <S%G4374>offer<s%> <S%G1336>continually,<s%> <S%G5048>make<s%> <S%G5048>perfect<s%> those who draw <S%G5048>near.<s%>

<S%G235>But<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>those<s%> sacrifices there is <S%G2596>a<s%> <S%G1763>yearly<s%> <S%G364>reminder<s%> of <S%G266>sins.<s%>
<S%G1063>For<s%> it is <S%G102>impossible<s%> <S%G851>that<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G5022>bulls<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5131>goats<s%> should take <S%G851>away<s%> <S%G266>sins.<s%>

<S%G1352>Therefore<s%> when he <S%G1525>comes<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2889>world,<s%> he <S%G3004>says,<s%> <S%G2378>"Sacrifice<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4376>offering<s%> you <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G2309>desire,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> you <S%G2675>prepared<s%> a <S%G4983>body<s%> for <S%G3427>me;<s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G2036>I<s%> <S%G2400>said,<s%> 'Behold, I have <S%G2240>come<s%> <S%G1722>(in<s%> the <S%G2777>scroll<s%> of the <S%G975>book<s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%>) to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2307>will,<s%> O <S%G2316>God.<s%>'"

<S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2307>will<s%> we have <S%G2070>been<s%> <S%G37>sanctified<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G4376>offering<s%> of the <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> once for <S%G2178>all.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G3956>Every<s%> <S%G2409>priest<s%> <S%G3303>indeed<s%> <S%G2476>stands<s%> day <S%G2596>by<s%> <S%G3008>day<s%> <S%G3008>serving<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4178>often<s%> <S%G4374>offering<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G2378>sacrifices,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G3763>never<s%> take <S%G4014>away<s%> <S%G266>sins,<s%>

from that <S%G3063>time<s%> <S%G1551>waiting<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2190>enemies<s%> are <S%G5087>made<s%> the <S%G4228>footstool<s%> of his <S%G846>feet.<s%>
<S%G1063>For<s%> by <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4376>offering<s%> he has <S%G5048>perfected<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G1336>forever<s%> those who are being <S%G37>sanctified.<s%>
<S%G4151>The<s%> <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> testifies to <S%G2254>us,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G4280>saying,<s%>

<S%G3778>"This<s%> is the <S%G1242>covenant<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> I will <S%G1303>make<s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> <S%G846>them:<s%> <S%G3326><s%> 'After <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%>' <S%G3004>says<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G1325><s%> 'I will put <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3551>laws<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2588>heart,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> I will also <S%G1924>write<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G1271>mind;<s%>'" then he says,
<S%G846>"I<s%> will <S%G3415>remember<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G266>sins<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G458>iniquities<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G2089>more.<s%>"
<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G859>remission<s%> of <S%G5130>these<s%> <S%G3765>is,<s%> there is no more <S%G4376>offering<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G266>sin.<s%>

<S%G2192>Having<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G3954>boldness<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> enter <S%G1529>into<s%> the holy <S%G39>place<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%>

by the <S%G3598>way<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G1457>dedicated<s%> for <S%G2254>us,<s%> a <S%G4372>new<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G3598>way,<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G2665>veil,<s%> <S%G5124>that<s%> is to <S%G2076>say,<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4561>flesh;<s%>
<S%G2532>and<s%> having a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2409>priest<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> the <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%>

<S%G4334>let<s%>'s draw near <S%G3326>with<s%> a <S%G228>true<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4136>fullness<s%> of <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G4472>having<s%> our <S%G2588>hearts<s%> <S%G4472>sprinkled<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G4893>an<s%> <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G4893>conscience,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> having our <S%G4983>body<s%> <S%G3068>washed<s%> with <S%G2513>pure<s%> <S%G5204>water,<s%>

let us hold <S%G2722>fast<s%> the <S%G3671>confession<s%> <S%G1680>of<s%> our <S%G1680>hope<s%> without <S%G186>wavering;<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G1861>he<s%> who <S%G1861>promised<s%> is <S%G4103>faithful.<s%>
Let us <S%G2657>consider<s%> how <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3948>provoke<s%> one <S%G240>another<s%> <S%G2041>to<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2041>works,<s%>

<S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1459>forsaking<s%> our <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G1997>assembling<s%> <S%G1997>together,<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> the <S%G1485>custom<s%> of <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G235>is,<s%> but <S%G3870>exhorting<s%> one <S%G2532>another;<s%> and so <S%G5118>much<s%> the <S%G3123>more,<s%> <S%G3745>as<s%> you <S%G991>see<s%> the <S%G2250>Day<s%> <S%G1448>approaching.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G264>if<s%> <S%G2257>we<s%> <S%G264>sin<s%> <S%G1596>willfully<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> we have <S%G2983>received<s%> the <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> of the <S%G225>truth,<s%> there <S%G620>remains<s%> no <S%G3765>more<s%> a <S%G2378>sacrifice<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G266>sins,<s%>

<S%G1161>but<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G5398>fearful<s%> <S%G1561>expectation<s%> of <S%G2920>judgment,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G2205>fierceness<s%> of <S%G4442>fire<s%> <S%G2068>which<s%> <S%G3195>will<s%> <S%G2068>devour<s%> the <S%G5227>adversaries.<s%>

A man <S%G5100>who<s%> <S%G114>disregards<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%>' <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G599>dies<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G3628>compassion<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the word of <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G3144>witnesses.<s%>

How <S%G4214>much<s%> <S%G5501>worse<s%> <S%G5098>punishment,<s%> do <S%G1380>you<s%> <S%G515>think,<s%> will he be judged worthy <S%G2662>of,<s%> who has trodden under foot the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> has <S%G2233>counted<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of the <S%G1242>covenant<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he was <S%G37>sanctified<s%> an unholy <S%G2839>thing,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> has <S%G1796>insulted<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G5485>grace?<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> him who <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G1557>"Vengeance<s%> belongs to <S%G1698>me,<s%>" <S%G3004>says<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G1473>"I<s%> will <S%G467>repay.<s%>" <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3825>Again,<s%> "The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> will <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2992>people.<s%>"
It is a fearful <S%G5398>thing<s%> to <S%G1706>fall<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G5495>hands<s%> of <S%G2316>the<s%> <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G363>remember<s%> the <S%G4386>former<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3739>which,<s%> after you were <S%G5461>enlightened,<s%> you <S%G5278>endured<s%> <S%G119>a<s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G119>struggle<s%> with <S%G3804>sufferings;<s%>

<S%G3303>partly,<s%> being <S%G2301>exposed<s%> to <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G3680>reproaches<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2347>oppressions;<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G5124>partly,<s%> <S%G1096>becoming<s%> <S%G2844>partakers<s%> with those who <S%G390>were<s%> <S%G390>treated<s%> <S%G3779>so.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> you both had <S%G4834>compassion<s%> on <S%G3450>me<s%> in my <S%G1199>chains,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5479>joyfully<s%> <S%G4327>accepted<s%> <S%G3326><s%> the <S%G724>plundering<s%> <S%G5224>of<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5224>possessions,<s%> <S%G1097>knowing<s%> <S%G1722>that<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> for <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> a <S%G2909>better<s%> possession <S%G2532>and<s%> an <S%G3306>enduring<s%> <S%G5223>one<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3772>heavens.<s%>
<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> <S%G3361>don't<s%> <S%G577>throw<s%> <S%G577>away<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3954>boldness,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3405>reward.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2192>you<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> <S%G5281>endurance<s%> so <S%G2443>that,<s%> having <S%G4160>done<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> you may <S%G2865>receive<s%> the <S%G1860>promise.<s%>
<S%G1063>"In<s%> a <S%G2089>very<s%> <S%G3397>little<s%> <S%G3745>while,<s%> he who <S%G2064>comes<s%> will <S%G2240>come,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5549>will<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5549>wait.<s%>

<S%G2532>But<s%> the <S%G1342>righteous<s%> will <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G1537>by<s%> <S%G4102>faith.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1437>If<s%> he shrinks <S%G5288>back,<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G5590>soul<s%> <S%G2106>has<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G2106>pleasure<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>"
